title: Suspicious login from TOR network
description: Login attempt detected from TOR exit node in Netherlands at unusual time (3:15 AM)
resolutionNotes: Session revoked, user contacted, confirmed unauthorized access attempt. Password reset completed.

title: Login from China (unusual location)
description: Login detected from IP in China, user normally logs in from Russia
resolutionNotes: Session immediately revoked. VPN usage confirmed by user.

title: Failed login from Nigeria
description: Multiple failed login attempts followed by successful login from Nigerian IP
resolutionNotes: Brute force attempt detected, session revoked, account temporarily locked.

title: Login without MFA verification
description: User logged in from new device without completing MFA challenge

title: Suspicious session without MFA
description: Session created from Vietnam without MFA, user location is Russia

title: Mass data export detected
description: User exported 500+ records from portfolio module in single session

title: After-hours system access
description: User accessed system at 2:00 AM outside normal working hours

title: User suspended - role revoked
description: User role binding revoked due to employment termination

title: Elevated privileges without approval
description: User's role was modified without going through approval workflow

title: Large report generation
description: User generated quarterly report package - expected activity

title: VPN login detected
description: User logged in through VPN from unusual IP range

title: Multiple failed login attempts
description: 5 failed login attempts before successful login

title: MFA not enrolled - accessing sensitive data
description: User without MFA accessing tax module with sensitive data

title: Client login without MFA
description: Client user logged in without MFA from Switzerland

title: Trustee login without MFA
description: Trustee accessed system without MFA verification

title: Concurrent sessions from different countries
description: Active sessions detected from Russia and Cyprus simultaneously

title: Sensitive data access without business need
description: CFO accessed client personal data outside reporting workflow
resolutionNotes: Verified legitimate business need for audit preparation.

title: Advisor scope reduced
description: Advisor access reduced to specific households per access review
resolutionNotes: Planned change from access review rev-003.

title: New device login - Android tablet
description: First login from Android device, user typically uses desktop

title: Bulk portfolio data export
description: CIO exported full portfolio data for all clients

title: Brute force attack detected
description: 100+ failed login attempts from single IP targeting multiple accounts
resolutionNotes: IP blocked at firewall level. No successful breaches.

title: Long idle session
description: Session remained active for 8+ hours without activity
resolutionNotes: User confirmed left browser open, no security concern.
